tuv.seg: Tomato & basil granita
番茄罗勒意大利粗冰糕
Ingredients
原料
Serves 8 as a starter
8人份开胃菜
900 g very ripe tomatoes
900克熟透的番茄
salt
盐
sugar
糖
1 garlic clove , finely chopped
1颗蒜瓣，剁细
ground black pepper
黑胡椒粉
red wine vinegar
红酒醋
bunch basil leaves , removed from stalk
一簇罗勒叶子，从茎上摘取下来
Method
方法
Chop the tomatoes and place in a bowl with all the other ingredients except the basil leaves.
1.将番茄切碎，放入碗中，加入除罗勒叶子之外的所有的原料。
If you have time, leave them to macerate at room temperature overnight.
如果时间充裕，将混合物在常温下过夜浸渍。
Blitz in a blender - in batches, then strain through a fine sieve.
分批将混合的原料在搅拌机中强力打翻，然后用细筛子过滤。
Shred the basil leaves and stir through.
加入撕碎的罗勒，充分搅拌。
Clear a shelf in the freezer and place a sided metal tray in to chill.
2.冰箱冷冻室中腾出一块地方，然后放入金属托盘进行冷却。
Make up your mix and leave to cool, then pour into the tray and cover with cling film.
把混合好的原料冷却之后放入托盘，并盖上保鲜膜。
Freeze the liquid until frozen around the edges and slushy in the middle.
冷冻至托盘边缘完全冻结而中心仍然松软为止。
Use a fork to break up the ice into smaller crystals.
用叉子将冰块弄碎成细小的晶体状。
Return the tray to the freezer.
然后把托盘放回冰冻室。
Repeat the breaking up process every half hour (at least three times) until it's completely frozen and the texture of snow.
每半小时拿出托盘弄碎冰块，重复至少三次直到最后一次完全冻结后呈现出雪花状。
For a quicker method: freeze the mixture in an ice tray, then blitz the cubes in a food processor just before serving.
另附快速方法：将原料混合物放入冰块托盘中完全冻结。
The texture will be slightly slushier, but just as delicious.
在食用之前将混合物冰块放入搅拌机中强力打碎即可。这种方法制作成品质感会有些松软，但一样美味。
